judicialResults.label: Costs
judicialResults.resultText:
FCOST - Costs
To pay costs of £8765.00 to first name last

judicialResultPrompts.label: Payment frequency following lump sum
judicialResultPrompts.welshLabel: Amlder y taliadau yn dilyn y cyfandaliad

judicialResultPrompts.label: Number of days in default
judicialResultPrompts.welshLabel: Nifer y diwrnodau y mae'r ddyled heb ei thalu

judicialResults.label: Payment terms - Lump sum plus instalments
judicialResults.resultText:
LUMSI - Payment terms - Lump sum plus instalments
Payment terms - Lump sum plus instalments. Lump sum amount: £876.00. Instalment amount: £987.00 to be paid monthly from 13/04/2026. Parent / Guardian to pay. Number of days in default: 56. Payment card required.

judicialResultPrompts.label: Reason for no collection order
judicialResultPrompts.welshLabel: Rheswm am beidio â gwneud gorchymyn casglu

judicialResults.label: No collection order reason
judicialResults.resultText:
NOCOLLO - No collection order reason
No collection order. Reason: impracticable or inappropriate. Additional reasons: Additional reasons.
judicialResults.welshLabel: Rheswm dros beidio â gwneud Gorchymyn Casglu

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 8(1) of the Theft Act 1968.
offences.offenceLegislationWelsh: Yn groes i adran 8(1) Deddf Dwyn 1968.
offences.wording: From 13th November 2018, an aggravated version of this offence applies where the offence is committed against an emergency worker acting in the exercise of his / her functions as such a worker, as per section 1 of the Assaults on emergency Workers (Offences) Act 2018; see offence wording document H19568.

judicialResults.label: Surcharge
judicialResults.resultText:
FVS - Surcharge
To pay a surcharge of £87654.00

judicialResults.label: Slavery and Trafficking Reparation Order
judicialResults.resultText:
SATRO - Slavery and Trafficking Reparation Order
Amount of reparation compensation: £7896.00
judicialResults.welshLabel: Gorchymyn Gwneud Iawn Caethwasiaeth a Masnachu Pobl

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft    Act 1968.
offences.offenceLegislationWelsh: Yn groes i adran 1(1) a 7 Deddf Dwyn 1968.
offences.wording: From 13th November 2018, an aggravated version of this offence applies where the offence is committed against an emergency worker acting in the exercise of his / her functions as such a worker, as per section 1 of the Assaults on emergency Workers (Offences) Act 2018; see offence wording document H19568.

judicialResultPrompts.label: Sentence imposed on the specified date is set aside
Financial penalties to be written off
Prosecutor to be notified organisation name
Prosecutor to be notified address line 1
Prosecutor to be notified post code

judicialResults.label: Case reopened
judicialResults.resultText:
ROPENED - Case reopened
Case reopened Section 385 of the Sentencing Act 2020. Sentence imposed on 13/05/2026 set aside.
